main event: A civilian observer in Amarillo, Texas reported seeing two light-colored objects on June 8, 1966 around 0340Z.
interesting points: The object was described as a light about as bright as the North Star that traveled across the sky and then disappeared.
The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes.
The observer felt the description was consistent with a satellite sighting.
The Air Force requested additional information from the observer to aid in identification of the object.
The report indicates there were no photographs taken of the object.
